item.title: Yeti Getaway
item.description: Avoid being caught! Swipe your Yeti to avoid obstacles and collect powerups, and donâ€™t forget to eat them apples! /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .
